original: intros. split. - intros H1. split. + intros H2. apply (deduction_modus_ponens _ x); auto. + intros H2. apply (deduction_modus_ponens _ y); auto. - intros [H1 H2]. assert (x --> z). { apply ded_impp_trans with (y := y); auto. } assert (y --> z). { apply ded_impp_trans with (y := x); auto. } apply deduction_orp_elim; auto.
